Plot: An undercover FBI agent falls in love with a recently widowed mafia wife seeking to start her life over after her husband's murder and who is also pursued by a libidinous mafia kingpin seeking to claim her for himself.
Title: Married to the Mob
Actors: Paul Lazar, Alec Baldwin, Captain Haggerty, Marlene Willoughby
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 6 wins & 4 nominations.
